Griffon's Pull.name: Griffon's Pull
Griffon's Pull.flavor: Your griffon reaches out with its beak and pulls your enemies close. You then seize the opportunity to attack.
Griffon's Pull.onHit: 1[B] + beast’s Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares into a space adjacent to your Vadalis-bred griffon beast companion. Make a secondary attack that is a melee weapon attack.
Griffon's Pull.secondaryTarget: One creature that was a primary target
Griffon's Pull.secondaryAttack: Strength vs. AC. You have combat advantage against the secondary target.
Griffon's Pull.secondaryOnHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Invigorating Dive.name: Invigorating Dive
Invigorating Dive.flavor: The rush of the wind and the anticipation of attacking your prey give you and your griffon a surge of vigor.
Invigorating Dive.requirement: You must be mounted on a creature that is flying.
Invigorating Dive.effect: Each target regains hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Snatching Assault.name: Snatching Assault
Snatching Assault.flavor: Your griffon grabs your enemy in its talons and whisks it away.
Snatching Assault.onHit: 2[B] + beast Strength’s modifier damage, and the target is grabbed. Until the grab ends, your Vadalis-bred griffon beast companion can move the target without needing to make a Strength attack.
Snatching Assault.effect: After the attack, your Vadalis-bred griffon beast companion can move half its speed.
